Reviews.Title: No manufacturer backup
Reviews.Author: Gene Callan
Reviews.Content: Tried to contact Samsung for installation / wiring type questions as offered in pamphlet .  Left message.  No return call.

Reviews.Title: "No HDD" error - useless without HDD
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: It took us about 1 month to have time to setup the system. After all the hard work, we connect everything and the DVR is giving a "No HDD" error. Basically the DVR is not finding any storage device inside to record any video. Called tech support who said to go online and request a service repair ticket. I filled that out on Samsung's website. Almost a week later no response. I called the department that handles those repair request approvals and left a message. No answer so far. I paid $600 for something that can't do it's basic function...record video.
